sn45.6:1: At Sāvatthī. Then a certain bhikkhu approached the Blessed One … . Sitting to one side, that bhikkhu said to the Blessed One:
sn45.6:2: "This Noble Eightfold Path, bhikkhu, is the holy life; that is, right view … right concentration.sn.v.8The destruction of lust, the destruction of hatred, the destruction of delusion: this is the final goal of the holy life."
